title: Azure Service Bus: Get message from a topic subscription - Peek lock abandon pattern
description: This workflow template triggers when a message is available in a Service Bus topic subscription. The workflow gets the message from the topic subscription and locks the message for processing. The message is deleted from the topic subscription after processing completes. This pattern helps you make sure that the workflow processes the message only once and that the message doesn't get lost if a failure happens during processing.
prerequisites: Before you use this template, you need to create or set up an existing Service Bus namespace, and create a queue. For more information, see [Create a Service Bus namespace and queue](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2282508).

parameters.name: topicName_#workflowname#
parameters.description: The name for the Service Bus topic from where to get the message.

parameters.name: subscriptionName_#workflowname#
parameters.description: The name for the Service Bus topic subscription from where to get the message

parameters.name: messageBatchSize_#workflowname#
parameters.description: The number of messages to get as a single batch.
